document_name: Final Evaluation of Enhancing the Capacity of Turkey to Adapt to Climate Change (MDGF 1680)

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: The core objective of the Joint Programme is to develop capacity for managing climate change risks to rural and coastal development in Turkey. This will be achieved by mainstreaming climate change adaptation into the national development framework, building capacity in national and regional institutions, piloting community-based adaptation projects in the Seyhan River Basin, and integrating climate change adaptation into all UN agencies in Turkey.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The core objective of the Joint Programme is to develop capacity for managing climate change risks to rural and coastal development in Turkey. This will be achieved by mainstreaming climate change adaptation into the national development framework, building capacity in national and regional institutions, piloting community-based adaptation projects in the Seyhan River Basin, and integrating climate change adaptation into all UN agencies in Turkey.

project_descr: MDG-F  1680:  Enhancing the Capacity of Turkey to Adapt to Climate Change
project_title: MDG-F  1680:  Adaptation to Climate Change - Turkey
